Transcript.Content: Your estimated wait time is currently less than one minute.
We'll connect you with an agent as soon as possible. For a faster resolution, please tell us how we can help you today.

CUSTOM_SYSTEM_MESSAGE_You are now connected to Hejem, who is reviewing your account. If you need to share sensitive information, such as credit card number, please wait for your agent to give you steps to share it securely.
Hello, I'd be happy to help you today, let me first pull up your account information and access your details.
Thank you for your time. May I know if you are looking to switch to cc all apps individual plan?
Hi there, yes i am
but i had payments that was debited last week for the other plans
i wanted to refund for what i have paid last week and start the creative cloud all apps plan please
Yes you will the pro-rated refund on all the single applications apart from Stock. Do you wish to proceed with the changes?
yes please
i was also offered with a 3 month free for the cloud and stock
and was told that the next payment would be debited in Dec
for the inconvenience as i am paying way more at the moment
I completely understand. Let me check that for you about the free months. Please stay connected.
ok thank you
Ankita is the rep who was assisting me with this but i had to join a meeting and was disconnected
Thank you for that. Let me place an order for Cc all apps at 30.34 GBP/month and a free 3 months Once we are done changing the plan I can add the free months on stock as a well
ok, please can you confirm exactly what i will be paying and what will be refunded
i am very nervous as i have been paying so much previously
You will get the refund for all the single applications.
ok great
and then what will i be paying exactly?
You will be paying for cc all apps that is 30.34 GBP/month and GBP 23.99 GBP for stock but the next 3 months will be waived off.
I was offered Â£15 p/m
this is the previous convo with Ankita

Sorry for the mistype :- Okay no problem, yes you are currently paying GBP 73.91 per month for all the plans, what if I offer you Adobe Creative Cloud All Apps plan at just GBP 30.34 per month plus free 3 months and Adobe Stock plan at just GBP 15.59 per month plus free 3 months?
Is it possible to have this package please?
and i was also advised that the cancellation fee would be waivered
Yes cancellation fees would not be applicable because we will be changing the plan.
ok
would i have all the changes in writing?
I feel very nervous
Yes you will. Shall I proceed with the changes?
yes please

Subscription Terms:

Your subscription begins as soon as your initial payment is processed. Your subscription will automatically renew annually without notice until you cancel. You authorize us to store your payment method(s) and to automatically charge your payment method(s) every month until you cancel. We will automatically charge you the then-current rate for your plan, plus applicable taxes (such as VAT or GST if the rate does not include it), every month of your annual contract until you cancel.

We may change your planâs rate each annual renewal term, and we will notify you of any rate change with the option to cancel. If the applicable VAT or GST rate (or other included tax or duty) changes during your one-year term, we will accordingly adjust the tax-inclusive price for your plan mid-term on your next billing date.

If your primary payment method fails, you authorize us to charge any other payment method in your account. If you have not provided us a backup payment method(s) and you fail to provide p

ayment, or if all payment methods in your account fail, we may suspend your subscription. You can edit your payment information anytime in your Adobe Account page.

For European Economic Area customers, your bank may require you to authenticate your initial purchase using a password, a one-time code sent to your mobile number, or biometric recognition. When you authenticate, you also authorize us to charge your payment method for your additional purchases without providing us further payment information or other instructions (i.e., we will initiate future payments independently). Such additional purchases may occur when we automatically charge your payment method in connection with a recurring subscription or when you add or change licenses or products.

Cancellation Terms:

You can cancel your subscription anytime via your Adobe Account page or by contacting Customer Support*. If you cancel within 14 days of your initial order, youâll be fully refunded. Should you cancel after 14 days, youâll be charged a lu

mp sum amount of 50% of your remaining contract obligation and your service will continue until the end of that monthâs billing period.

Please reply with I AGREE on the above mentioned T&C for cc all apps at 30.34 GBP/month
sorry just to confirm, i will be charged monthly for the year?
I need to check my payment card to ensure you have the correct one stored
Yes you will be charge monthly for a year. Please and confirm the last 4 digits to be sure.
after the year, i will still be charged monthly?

You will always be charge monthly for this plan and this is the correct card details. 

Request you to please reply with I AGREE on the above mentioned T&C
AGREE
please confirm that i will also have the adobe stocks as you mentioned

I have successfully placed an order for cc all apps. Please reply with I AGREE on the above mentioned T&C for stock plan at 15.59 GBP/month.
AGREE
and please confirm refund and removal of the other plans please
i would only like to see the creative cloud apps and the adobe stocks on my account
I really appreciate your help. I am very excited to have access to all these products and be creative!

I have successfully placed both the plans.

I have successfully cancelled this plan with the refund of 13.98 GBP for After Effects, stock plan 7.20 GBP , GBP 1.39 Tax rate GBP 20% for Photography plan (20GB),. Refund would not be applicable for Premiere Pro plan as today is the billing date and the payment has been declined.
what will i need to do about the premiere pro?
as it was declined, can you still just cancel and remove that plan
as i now have the full cloud package?
Yes I will just cancel it so there will be payment attemps
ok thank you
so now, i just have cloud full package and stocks
sorry i am looking at my plan
did i get 3 months free?
You are welcome. Let me add the 3 free months for you on all the apps and stock plan.
oh snap, thank you :)
Thank you Hejem, i can see that this has been updated. I am very happy about this

You are most welcome. I have successfully added the 3 free months on your both the subscriptions so your next billing date is on 24 Dec 2022 and your next renewal date is on 24 Aug 2023.

You will also receive an email confirming the same.
You are most welcome and Happy to help. You may receive an email with a survey link. Please take a moment to rate your experience and help us improve. Thanks!
CUSTOM_SYSTEM_MESSAGE_Hejem has left the conversation.
